name: JobWand
description: SaaS solution for job search management
overview:
“Making Jobhunting Magically Manageable” is our company mantra. We strive to help jobseekers better manage their job search, by releasing them from the constraints of the typical spreadsheet and by making arduous tasks less cumbersome.

Jobseekers need to manage a LOT of data in their quest for work. They have to manage all of the metadata (company, job title, url, etc.) for each job opportunity they pursue, as well as all of the different, customized versions of their resumes, cover letters, etc. JobWand manages all of that.

We relieve many of these pain points with the following features: (1) automated job posting capture and caching via a browser bookmarklet; (2) easy meta data extraction with our “click-and-fill” technology; and (3) integration with a number of API providers, such as LinkedIn, MeetUp, SimplyHired, Google Documents, and Twitter.

By minimizing the time and effort jobseekers need to allocate to administrative tasks, we enable them to focus on the more important activities that will help them land their next jobs.
